name: Stel
description:
It was supposed to be simple trip to the doctor, but instead of medicine you received a map, and were shoved into an unfamiliar land, to have your mettle tested.

The young boy, Stel, is sent off to find the local Witch by his ill father. Stel meets with the Witch believing she can cure his father’s illness, instead she gives Stel vague instructions of tasks he needs to complete. After completing all of the Witches tasks she reveals that she cannot cure his father's illness and the trials he completed was part of a rite of passage into adulthood, and that Stel has proven his right to take over as the head of his family.

Play as the callow “Stel” in a 3rd person perspective, puzzle-lite, narrative-driven game, and do what’s been asked of you… What is that, again?
